titleStmt.title: By the committee of the Lords and Commons for the safety of King and kingdome. Die Sabathi 17. Septembris. 1642
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: All persons who have enrolled any horses with the commissaries in London are to deliver them up for public service forthwith. -- Steele.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
